name: Vehicle dataset
data_intro: This dataset contains information about used cars.

cat_feature_intro.Car_Name: The name or model of the car (e.g., Toyota Corolla, Honda Civic).
cat_feature_intro.Fuel_Type: The type of fuel the car uses (e.g., Petrol, Diesel, CNG, Electric).
cat_feature_intro.Seller_Type: The type of seller listing the car (e.g., Individual, Dealer).
cat_feature_intro.Transmission: The type of transmission in the car (e.g., Manual, Automatic).

num_feature_intro.Year: The year the car was manufactured.
num_feature_intro.Selling_Price: The price at which the car is being sold.
num_feature_intro.Present_Price: The current market price of the car.
num_feature_intro.Kms_Driven: The total distance (in kilometers) the car has been driven.
